title: Don't Dream It's Over
body:
[C] There is freedom within, [Am] there is freedom without
[F] Try to catch the deluge in a paper [E] cup        
[C] There's a battle ahead, [Am] many battles are lost
[F] But you'll never see the end of the road
while you're [E] travelling with me

  [F] Hey now, [G] hey now 
  Don't [C] dream it's [Am] over
  [F] Hey now, [G] hey now 
  When the [C] world comes [Am] in
  [F] They come, [G] they come 
  [C] To build a wall [Am] between us
  [F] We know they won't win [G]

[C] Now I'm towing my car, [Am] there's a hole in the roof
[F] My possessions are causing me suspicion but [E] there's no proof
[C] In the paper today [Am] tales of war and of waste
[F] But you turn right over to the [E] T.V. page

  [F] Hey now, [G] hey now 
  Don't [C] dream it's [Am] over
  [F] Hey now, [G] hey now 
  When the [C] world comes [Am] in
  [F] They come, [G] they come 
  [C] To build a wall [Am] between us
  [F] We know they won't win [G]

[C] Now I'm walking again [Am] to the beat of a drum
[F] And I'm counting the steps to the door of your [E] heart
[C] Only the shadows ahead [Am] barely clearing the roof
[F] Get to know the feeling of liberation [E] and relief

  [F] Hey now, [G] hey now 
  Don't [C] dream it's [Am] over
  [F] Hey now, [G] hey now 
  When the [C] world comes [Am] in
  [F] They come, [G] they come 
  [C] To build a wall [Am] between us
  [F] We know they won't win [G]

----
Crowded House - Don't Dream It's Over
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J9gKyRmic20
bodyLyrics:
There is freedom within, there is freedom without
Try to catch the deluge in a paper cup 
There's a battle ahead, many battles are lost
But you'll never see the end of the road
while you're travelling with me

Hey now, hey now 
Don't dream it's over
Hey now, hey now 
When the world comes in
They come, they come 
To build a wall between us
We know they won't win 

Now I'm towing my car, there's a hole in the roof
My possessions are causing me suspicion but there's no proof
In the paper today tales of war and of waste
But you turn right over to the T.V. page

Hey now, hey now 
Don't dream it's over
Hey now, hey now 
When the world comes in
They come, they come 
To build a wall between us
We know they won't win 

Now I'm walking again to the beat of a drum
And I'm counting the steps to the door of your heart
Only the shadows ahead barely clearing the roof
Get to know the feeling of liberation and relief

Hey now, hey now 
Don't dream it's over
Hey now, hey now 
When the world comes in
They come, they come 
To build a wall between us
We know they won't win 

----
Crowded House - Don't Dream It's Over
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J9gKyRmic20
